info.title: Custom URL Shortener API
info.description: API for user authentication, URL shortening, and analytics.

post.description: Verifies the Google ID token and creates a user session.

idToken.description: Google ID token obtained from client-side authentication.

post.description: Generates a short URL for a provided long URL. Optionally, a custom alias and topic can be provided. The short URL is associated with the authenticated user.

longUrl.description: The original long URL that needs to be shortened.

customAlias.description: An optional custom alias for the short URL.

topic.description: An optional topic/category to group the URL.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the short URL was created.

400.description: Bad request - Invalid or missing parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid JWT token.

500.description: Internal server error - URL shortening failed.

get.description: Redirects the user to the original URL associated with the custom alias.

parameters.name: customAlias
parameters.description: The custom alias of the shortened URL.

302.description: Successfully redirected to the original URL.

404.description: URL does not exist for the given custom alias.

get.summary: Retrieve detailed analytics for a specific short URL
get.description: Provides insights into the performance of the specified short URL, including total clicks, unique users, and analytics broken down by OS type and device type.

parameters.name: alias
parameters.description: The custom alias of the shortened URL.

200.description: Analytics data successfully retrieved for the short URL.

totalClicks.description: Total number of clicks for the short URL.

uniqueUsers.description: Number of unique users who accessed the short URL.

clicksByDate.description: An array of objects containing the date and click count for the last 7 days.

date.description: The date of the click data.

clickCount.description: The number of clicks for the given date.

osType.description: An array of objects containing OS type analytics.

osName.description: The name of the operating system (e.g., Windows, macOS, Linux, iOS, Android).

uniqueClicks.description: Number of unique clicks for the specified OS.

uniqueUsers.description: Number of unique users who accessed the short URL using the specified OS.

deviceType.description: An array of objects containing device type analytics.

deviceName.description: The type of device used (e.g., mobile, desktop).

uniqueClicks.description: Number of unique clicks for the specified device type.

uniqueUsers.description: Number of unique users who accessed the short URL using the specified device.

404.description: The specified short URL alias does not exist.

500.description: Internal server error - Unable to fetch analytics data.

get.summary: Retrieve analytics for all short URLs grouped under a specific topic
get.description: Allows users to assess the performance of their links based on categories or topics.

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: The topic/category to group the short URLs under.

200.description: Analytics data successfully retrieved for the topic.

totalClicks.description: Total number of clicks across all URLs in the specified topic.

uniqueUsers.description: Number of unique users who accessed URLs in the specified topic.

clicksByDate.description: An array of objects containing date and total click counts for all URLs under the topic.

date.description: The date of the click data.

clickCount.description: The number of clicks for the given date.

urls.description: An array of URLs under the specified topic.

totalClicks.description: Total number of clicks for the short URL.

uniqueUsers.description: Number of unique users who accessed the short URL.

404.description: No short URLs found for the specified topic.

500.description: Internal server error - Unable to fetch topic analytics.

get.summary: Retrieve overall analytics for all short URLs created by the authenticated user
get.description: Provides a comprehensive view of the user's link performance, including total clicks, unique users, and analytics broken down by OS type and device type.

totalUrls.description: Total number of short URLs created by the user.

totalClicks.description: Total number of clicks across all URLs created by the user.

uniqueUsers.description: Total number of unique users who accessed any of the user's short URLs.

clicksByDate.description: An array of objects containing date and total click counts for all URLs.

date.description: The date of the click data.

clickCount.description: The number of clicks for the given date.

osType.description: An array of objects containing OS type analytics.

osName.description: The name of the operating system (e.g., Windows, macOS, Linux, iOS, Android).

uniqueClicks.description: Number of unique clicks for the specified OS.

uniqueUsers.description: Number of unique users who accessed any URL using the specified OS.

deviceType.description: An array of objects containing device type analytics.

deviceName.description: The type of device used (e.g., mobile, desktop).

uniqueClicks.description: Number of unique clicks for the specified device type.

uniqueUsers.description: Number of unique users who accessed the short URL using the specified device.

500.description: Internal server error - Unable to fetch overall analytics.

bearerAuth.description: Use the JWT token obtained from Google authentication to access protected endpoints.
